 Yeah, I am lucky to have 3=C2=A0 RS 20-125, and that little one that is so=
me where in a drawer, it's a small little yellow one, but I haven't used it=
 for a long time, it has a button.=C2=A0 Then I have the bigger=C2=A0 RS 12=
-150, that I worked on myself, I just cut it's tracing wires, and it seems =
to be the clearest so far, less static too, which is great!=C2=A0 They talk=
 a lot because I let them watch TV or sometimes play music for them, haha, =
from what they say, The Man Upstairs, The Boss! some how placed these big s=
creens up with sound speakers for us to send those in darkness our input to=
 help them get, and stay in the line going into the light, I know, I'm weir=
d, but haha, that's what I've been told.=C2=A0 We all can actually help the=
m cross over so they can stay alive, and meet up with loved ones, and start=
 working to make up for all the negative horrible things they did to other =
people while they here on Earth.=C2=A0 I have some from when Sharon was doi=
ng her Frank's Box over the Skype, of them saying, that the line is "three =
years long ! " sf

or do you change up

<div style=3D"font-family: arial; color: black; font-size: 10pt;"> Yeah, I=
 am lucky to have 3  RS 20-125, and that little one that is some where=
 in a drawer, it's a small little yellow one, but I haven't used it for a l=
ong time, it has a button.  Then I have the bigger  RS 12-150, th=
at I worked on myself, I just cut it's tracing wires, and it seems to be th=
e clearest so far, less static too, which is great!  They talk a lot b=
ecause I let them watch TV or sometimes play music for them, haha, from wha=
t they say, The Man Upstairs, The Boss! some how placed these big screens u=
p with sound speakers for us to send those in darkness our input to help th=
em get, and stay in the line going into the light, I know, I'm weird, but h=
aha, that's what I've been told.  We all can actually help them cross =
over so they can stay alive, and meet up with loved ones, and start working=
 to make up for all the negative horrible things they did to other people w=
hile they here on Earth.  I have some from when Sharon was doing her F=
rank's Box over the Skype, of them saying, that the line is "three years lo=
ng ! " sf<br>
</div>

<div><br>
</div>
